topics.body:
Okay so fuck some people 
I went to the self check out at wal mart because I had one item and it shouldn't have taken more than a minute for me to check out
But then all but one of the machines says no cash back and all I have is bills so okay I wait for that one, there's only one person in front of me

Then as that person leaves, this fucker from one of the other self check outs Goes to the one I've been waiting for for whatever reason and starts ringing up half of their stuff like I don't even exist and takes waaaay more time than they reasonably should have. 
See, if they had been in the same cash situation I had been in and said "hey do you mind if I ring my stuff up at this one?" I would have let them go but they have to go and be a shit

^and of course I don't say shit because I have the confidence of a dead worm^

topics.body:
And in important science news the Rosetta Comet Lander reactivated yesterday.  Apparently what happened was that the lander accidentally landed on the shady side of the asteroid and had no power.

Now that the comet has changed orientation the lander can get to work.
